info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:58AM CDT until May 07 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR WESTERN MERCER AND SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA COUNTIES... At 1258 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ogle, or 7 miles southwest of Aledo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Aledo, Sunbeam, Mercer County Fairgrounds, Aledo Mercer County Airport and Gingle Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
